prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a seahorse with vibrant blue and white colors.
I want a small aquatic Pokemon with a curled tail and a friendly expression.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a marine creature, featuring scales and fins in light colors.
Make a playful creature inspired by sea life, showcasing unique features and a calm demeanor.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon with a serpentine body, perfect for swimming through underwater environments.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek silhouette and gentle features, evoking a sense of tranquility.
Show me a whimsical water-type Pokemon with a charming appearance and a spiraled tail.
